title: Zack Greinke
summary: Donald Zackary Greinke (/ˈɡreɪŋki/ GRAIN-kee; born October 21, 1983) is an American professional baseball pitcher who is a free agent. He has played in Major League Baseball (MLB) for the Kansas City Royals, Milwaukee Brewers, Los Angeles Angels of Anaheim, Los Angeles Dodgers, Arizona Diamondbacks, and Houston Astros.
